petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Heard argument for both sides.Later on, Judgement is delivered in the open court.The prosecution has failed to prove this case u/s 376(2)(i)/366 IPC and Section 4 of POCSO Act beyond all reasonable doubt.Hence that the accused is not guilty u/s u/s 366/376(2)(i) IPC and Section 4 of POCSO Act.The accused is acquitted and set at liberty.The bailbond stand cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities.The case is disposed of.
